<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent> <name>stylized_text_240/text</name> <preset/> <required_translations>[ ]</required_translations> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers */ function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) { var KPI_bds_list = api.data.verticalD_headlinemetric2v.output.result; var dropdown_selection = api.state.tab3PortfolioElement;
for(let i = 0; i < KPI_bds_list.length; i++) { var KPI_bd_sysid = KPI_bds_list[i].element.value; if (dropdown_selection === KPI_bd_sysid) { var KPI_bd_score = KPI_bds_list[i].scores[0].value_formatted; return KPI_bd_score; break; } } } ]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-01-22 13:53:28</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>eab4a6cf1bf371dcdba1c3e5464bcb27</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>stylized_text_240/text</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_eab4a6cf1bf371dcdba1c3e5464bcb27</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-01-22 13:53:28</sys_updated_on> <target>macroponent</target> <type>transform</type> </sys_ux_client_script> <sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope> <claim_timestamp>18d317878650000001</claim_timestamp> <metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_eab4a6cf1bf371dcdba1c3e5464bcb27</metadata_update_name> <previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version> <previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name> <previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope> <sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-01-22 13:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4536a6471bb771dcdba1c3e5464bcb47</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-01-22 13:59:55</sys_updated_on> </sys_claim> </record_update>
